actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to provide for thorough health and sanitation inspection of all livestock products imported into the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to provide for thorough health and sanitation inspection at time of entry of all livestock products imported into the United States. Provides that the inspection program shall be financed by a charge on the imported animals to be set by the Secretary of Agriculture.

titles.title: A bill to provide for thorough health and sanitation inspection of all livestock products imported into the United States, and for other purposes.
